I came here with a bunch of friends a couple weeks ago. So incredibly delicious you would not believe. The best sushi I've had in a long time, and on the top 5 in Barcelona for sure.I recommend just going with something you haven't tried before because everything is delicious.It's in a good location in Gràcia. Amazing location, right in the Gal.la PlacídiaBeautiful inside!Totally awesome, and a Barcelona local favorite.
